page.title: 20SPECIAL EVENTS
page.content: The Alford Craft Market {The Alford Craft Market}started in {1974}with about five stalls. It started because people wanted to promote arts and craft. There are about 35 stalls now. The craft market is on at the end of April and then at the end of June. There is a craft market at the August bank holiday. Then there is an indoor one at Christmas. About{30,000}people go to the craft market every year. This year there will be an art gallery at the {Alford Windmill.}The things that people buy are all handmade. There are portraits, wooden carvings & pots etc. The Alford Pottery is owned by{H & M {Ducos,}whose pottery is sold at the Craft Market and also exported worldwide.
